meanings.definition: A synthetic element with the symbol No and atomic number 102.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study nobelium to understand its properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled the nobelium sample with care.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student swapped the nobelium container with a fake one.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity about nobelium was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The glow of nobelium under the microscope fascinated the researchers.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Nobel Prize.
meanings.sent1: The nobelium ceremony honored outstanding achievements in science.
meanings.sent2: Her groundbreaking research led to a nobelium nomination.
meanings.sent3: The nobelium celebration was filled with joy and excitement.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was truly nobelium.
meanings.sent5: The nobelium recognition brought tears of happiness to her eyes.
